duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee banquet functions, ensuring proper food and beverage service and presentation for member and guest satisfaction.
Hold pre-function meetings with servers to ensure efficient service and coordinate the timing of courses with kitchen personnel.
Assure proper inventory of all banquet service equipment and supplies, regularly inspecting house service areas and equipment to meet department standards.
Act as Lead Waiter at special, private functions as needed and assume Opening or Closing Manager responsibilities when assigned.
Ensure staff is aware and ready to execute daily assignments and side work in their respective areas.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, or equivalent. Food Handlers Certificate, FSP certified, ASAP certified.
